body.p: The SDK contains a sample application, to demonstrate its basic usage, for example, to check the status of a file with the cloud and to upload it, if needed.

li.p: Edit the file src/file_demo_sdk.c , by replacing the define values with the ones provided to you by ABC.
Compile the application using the .sln file (for Visual Studio 2010) or the Makefile (for UNIX platforms) in the src folder.

body.p: The executable is created in the bin folder.
